spells.Effect: Hangs victim upside down by feet
Reveals a wands last spell / cast
Causes wounds as if slashed by a sword

mentions.Concordance: his head bawling, his great fists still flailing uncontrollably at everything around him, Harry seized his chance : petrificustotalus! the spell hit dolohov before he could block it, and he toppled for­ward across his comrade,
